thread.title: Screwworms detected in MX cattle, border remains open
thread.title_full: Screwworms detected in MX cattle, border remains open

title: Screwworms detected in MX cattle, border remains open
text:
“April live cattle has staged a modest rally today while not surprisingly, feeder cattle are weaker after USDA said they will not close the U.S. border to Mexican cattle despite the new screwworm detection. However, feeder cattle are only giving back a small portion of yesterday's rally which favors the bull camp after yesterday's significant strength,” according to The Hightower Report.
Screwworms detected in MX cattle, border remains open
